attributes.action: petition with signatures against sending British soldiers to Ukrain
attributes.additional_details: Bring this up in parliament every person who signs this petition is signing to say they vote against sending are people to Ukrain
attributes.background: Stop keir starmer dragging are country into a war.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
